about_the_game:
The upgraded and new Stella Gear usable in “Relayer Advanced”.
Players can gain advantage in battle by using this ultra-high performance Stella Gear exclusively for Alnilam: the one with the will of Alnilam.

【Available items】
・Epsilon NEXT
・Alnilam's battle data + (custom chip)

＊This is a separately sold "Epsilon NEXT" product.
＊There is also a bargain bundle set, "Relayer Advanced EXTRA PACK" which includes this product, and a "Stellar Gear NEXT Pack" which players can purchase 9 DLC mechas at a bargain price. Please be careful of duplicate purchases.
＊To use this content, the main game product (sold separately) is required. Also, if players need to apply the latest patch, please use this content after updating.

Players can get Alnilam’s exclusive new Stella Gear "Epsilon NEXT" and the custom chip, " Alnilam's battle data +".
This new Stella Gear can be used by going to "Training" > "Hangar" > "Switch" menu after Alnilam joins the team in the game.

＊DLC Stellar Gear have higher stats and exclusive custom bonuses that make them more powerful than even the standard models that are upgraded to the maximum level.
＊DLC Stellar Gear cannot be upgraded.
